ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] New Songs
ygData.msgSnippet: Personally, I m feeling pretty cranky about their exp nerfs right now.  Talk about making me want to end EQ. Halana/Tani ... From: Daniel Sniderman
ygData.messageBody:
Personally, I'm feeling pretty cranky about their exp nerfs right now. Talk
about making me want to end EQ.

Halana/Tani

-----Original Message-----
From: Daniel Sniderman [mailto:fuzzbone@...]
Sent: Thursday, September 05, 2002 4:23 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] New Songs


Saw that - seems like one of the patches fixed that. Glad to see that.
Going to make sure to try to get one soon in case it gets nerfed again soon!

Slyde

-----Original Message-----
From: Cyr, Thierry [mailto:thierry.cyr@...]
Sent: Thursday, September 05, 2002 9:03 AM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] New Songs


here's info for ya
pretty much everywhere in ssra. I wouldnt be surprised to see em drop off
the toetwister dude too

http://pub105.ezboard.com/ftheconcerthallbackstage.showMessage?topicID=14904
.topic

Minkin
rip
A ro


-----Original Message-----
From: Katye and Brandon [mailto:landmax13@...]
Sent: September 5, 2002 12:42 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] New Songs


may I take this moment to say

ACK!

Raub Zaumbie
now 56th lvl troubador
E. Marr server
Semper Questio

At 05:46 PM 09/04/2002 -0500, you wrote:
>I'm pretty PO'd. The new 58-Mez seems to drop on the Boss Mobs in Sssra.
>To me this is a balancing song - and they are putting it on mobs that
>require 30+ High Level people and an Emperor Key - and on Xegony are
amongst
>the most heavily contested mobs in the game.
>
>If this is the Non-Ancient Song - I can only imagine how difficult the
>Ancient songs are.
>
>Question - do any other classes have Level 58 Spells that drop on 62 Level
>mobs?
>
>Slyde
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: captrosha [mailto:captrosha@...]
>Sent: Wednesday, September 04, 2002 11:57 AM
>To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: [eqbards] New Songs
>
>
>Well,
>looks like we get a couple of new mez songs plus some Ancient Songs.
>I also think we got hosed on the DoT stacking issues. Figures they
>would not put in any effort to make the damage portion of our songs
>stack w/o having the debuff portion stack.
>
>Anyone had a chance to yet locate the new level 58 song? The patch
>message makes it look like it will be a quest??
>
>I also wonder off what uber mob the ancient songs will drop. Lcea
>would be the logical candidate but she doesn't seem to be difficult
>enough for a mob to drop ancient songs.
>
>Rosha "Spellsinger" Cristi
>Lvl 60
>Innoruuk
>
>
